com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events

Class SoaNewsListerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events.SoaNewsListerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class SoaNewsListerTask
extends TimerTask
    The SoaNewsListerTask is executed once per hour, and will fetch information from the News and Announcements forum along with the Promotions forum to announce within the Discord channel.

        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the RSS feed from the forums.
        client - The discord client object to be used for interacting with the Discord API
        scheduler - The task scheduler to be used for rescheduling the task after completion.
